welcome_message_body: Welcome to Wickford, a charming and picturesque town known for its beautiful waterfront and traditional English market. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all the hidden gems this town has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southend Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rochester Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rochester Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at London City Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and data usage.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stansted Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Stansted Airport is used for some international flights and low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wethersfield Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Wethersfield Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Biggin Hill Airport offers luxurious amenities and services for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
